testcase.title: Check the appropriate redirected URL from the WOS help page

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I select search "Basic Search"
I click on link "Help" on Top Toolbar menu

substeps.message: The link Web of Science Help is clicked

steps.title: I click on link "Web of Science Help" under "Help" menu
I click on "Index" on help page

substeps.message: The link Technical Support is clicked

steps.title: I click on link "Technical Support" on help page

substeps.message: The link Welcome to the Global Customer Support Center is clicked

steps.title: I click on link "Welcome to the Global Customer Support Center" on help page

substeps.message: The page is navigated to https://support.clarivate.com/ScientificandAcademicResearch/s/?language=en_US correctly when clicked on the link Welcome to the Global Customer Support Center

steps.title: I verify the page is redirected to the "https://support.clarivate.com/ScientificandAcademicResearch/s/?language=en_US" when clicked on the "Welcome to the Global Customer Support Center"

testcase.title: Check the display of error message on Basic search page for ALL fields (when NEAR or SAME operators are used)

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I select search "Basic Search"
I enter the search Term "Indian NEAR Constitution" with the field "All Fields"

I check that error message "The SAME and NEAR search operators are not supported in the All Fields search field. If you need to search for either of those words, please place in quotes (e.g., “near” field scanning)." is displayed on "Basic search" page
